# logtail_errors_application_group (Resource)

Organize error tracking applications into logical groups. Group related applications together for better management, shared settings, and unified error reporting across your software ecosystem. [Learn more](https://betterstack.com/docs/errors/api/applications-groups/list/).



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Application group name. Must be unique within your team.

### Optional

- `sort_index` (Number) The sort index of this application group.
- `team_name` (String) Used to specify the team the resource should be created in when using global tokens.

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) The time when this application group was created.
- `id` (String) The ID of this application group.
- `updated_at` (String) The time when this application group was updated.
